name: Yummy in the tummy
description: If you’re a bacon fan, there’s good news: It doesn’t have to be sizzling to be enjoyed. Plus, summer is the absolute perfect time to partner juicy melons and prosciutto. The irresistible combo of salty and sweet never tasted better when those cantaloupes and honeydews are at the peak of ripeness

name: Grab a Spoon!
description: A Big Chill Brunch spread is even better when cold soups, porridge and yogurt parfaits are included. Serve individual size portions in small mason jars for an extra helping of cuteness.

name: Shepperd's pie
description: An old favorite. Potato, beef and veggies baked together and served with garlic toast.

name: Meatloaf
description: Beef, corn, potatoes, and cheese are baked together in a pie shell
